newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Army helicopter crashes, eight killed.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Army helicopter crashes, eight killed.

text.p: A U.S. Army helicopter crashed on Tuesday at Fort Bragg, killing eight soldiers, Army officials said.
"An Army UH-60 Blackhawk helicopter crashed ... on Fort Bragg about 2:15 p.m. today, killing eight soldiers of the 82nd Airborne Division," the Army said in a statement.
"The names of the soldiers will be released after next of kin have been notified," the statement added.
An investigation was under way and no further information would be immediately available, Sgt. Ramona Rezenchek, a Fort Bragg spokeswoman, said.
